meanings: [동사] finish, complete, end, (informal) wrap up, (만족스럽게) round off

examples.korean: Use a finer piece of sandpaper to finish. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 마무리 작업에는 더 고운 샌드페이퍼를 써라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Use a finer piece of sandpaper to finish. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The finished roof should be weatherproof for years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 잘 마무리된 지붕은 오랫동안 비바람에 잘 견디게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The finished roof should be weatherproof for years. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Arsenal scored three late goals in a storming finish. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아스날이 에너지 넘치는 마무리로 뒤늦게 3골을 올렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Arsenal scored three late goals in a storming finish. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a fitting finale to the day’s events 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 날의 행사들에 걸맞은 마무리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a fitting finale to the day’s events Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They met to finalize the terms of the treaty. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 조약의 조건을 마무리짓기 위해 만났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They met to finalize the terms of the treaty. Add to Wordbook
